content: heritage surprise what is your heritage i thought i knew what mine was as it was drilled into me growing up where is your grandfather from your grandmother what is hogmanay what do we say on new year s of course you re going to rabbie burns dinner at the legion i knew i was scottish-canadian all of my family came from the areas of dumfriesshire and kurkudbrightshire and then we did our dna it turns out although my heritage is scottish my blood-line is mostly norwegian and danish what some research into this surprising information showed that kurkudbrightshire and dumfriesshire were viking settlements this sock shows the transition of my thoughts about my heritage using simple texture stitches this sock will move from scotland through the heel ending in norway/denmark lang may
